alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond du Lac; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 7:39PM CDT until June 15 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Wisconsin and southeast Wisconsin, including the following counties, in east central Wisconsin, Fond du Lac and Sheboygan. In southeast Wisconsin, Dodge and Washington. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying, urban and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 738 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fond Du Lac, Watertown, Beaver Dam, Waupun, Mayville, North Fond Du Lac, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Campbellsport, Theresa, Hustisford, Oakfield, Iron Ridge, Southern Lake Winnebago, Burnett, Taycheedah, Ashford, Lamartine and Byron. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
